protein.specific_function: Binds to hyaluronic acid and may be involved in formation of the extracellular matrix

reference.reference_text: Spicer AP, Joo A, Bowling RA Jr: A hyaluronan binding link protein gene family whose members are physically linked adjacent to chondroitin sulfate proteoglycan core protein genes: the missing links. J Biol Chem. 2003 Jun 6;278(23):21083-91. Epub 2003 Mar 27.

Nagase T, Kikuno R, Ohara O: Prediction of the coding sequences of unidentified human genes. XXI. The complete sequences of 60 new cDNA clones from brain which code for large proteins. DNA Res. 2001 Aug 31;8(4):179-87.
